Name: Irish Alexander
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of cacao powder or Cadbury's Flake bar..
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Dust with cacao powder or sprinkle crumbled Cadbury's Flake over cocktail.
History: An Irish whiskey cream liqueur variation on the Brandy Alexander .
Nutrition: One serving of Irish Alexander contains 278 calories
